select count(*) as cnt from saleinlots_tbl
saleinlots_area = #{saleInLotsArea}
AND
saleinlots_build_type like '%'||#{item}||'%'
AND
saleinlots_state like '%'||#{item}||'%'
AND
saleinlots_supply_type like '%'||#{item}||'%'

select saleinlots_idx as saleInLotsIDX, saleinlots_developer as saleInLotsDeveloper, saleinlots_build_type as saleInLotsBuildType, saleinlots_constructor as saleInLotsConstructor, saleinlots_supply_type as saleInLotsSupplyType, saleinlots_name as saleInLotsName, saleinLots_area as saleInLotsArea, saleinlots_detail_area as saleInLotsDetailArea, saleinlots_min_floor as saleInLotsMinFloor, saleinlots_max_floor as saleInLotsMaxFloor, saleinlots_house_scale as saleInLotsHouseScale, saleinLots_Household as saleInLotsHousehold, saleinlots_sale_household as saleInLotsSaleHousehold, saleinLots_price_one as saleInLotsPriceOne, saleinlots_price_min_all as saleInLotsPriceMinAll, saleinlots_price_max_all as saleInLotsPriceMaxAll, saleinLots_Recruitment_date as saleInLotsRecruitmentDate, saleinLots_start_date as saleInLotsStartDate, saleinLots_min_supply_area as saleInLotsMinSupplyArea, saleinLots_max_supply_area as saleInLotsMaxSupplyArea, saleinlots_state as saleInLotsState from saleinlots_tbl where saleinlots_idx = #{saleInLotsIDX}

select saleInLots_terms_idx as saleInLotsTermsIdx, saleInLots_terms_type as saleInLotsTermsType, saleInLots_terms_title as saleInLotsTermsTitle, saleInLots_terms_content as saleInLotsTermsContent from saleInLots_terms_tbl

select saleInLots_faq_idx as saleInLotsFaqIdx, saleInLots_faq_type as saleInLotsFaqType, saleInLots_faq_title as saleInLotsFaqTitle, saleInLots_faq_content as saleInLotsFaqContent from saleInLots_faq_tbl

select saleInLots_faq_idx as saleInLotsFaqIdx, saleInLots_faq_type as saleInLotsFaqType, saleInLots_faq_title as saleInLotsFaqTitle, saleInLots_faq_content as saleInLotsFaqContent from saleInLots_faq_tbl
where saleInLots_faq_type = #{saleInLotsFaqType}

select count(*) as cnt from saleInLots_tbl where
saleInLots_constructor like '%'||'에이치디씨현대산업개발'||'%'
saleInLots_constructor like '%'||'대우건설'||'%'
saleInLots_constructor like '%'||'지에스건설'||'%'
